messages.content: With incredible passion and determination as your Labour candidate for Leeds North West over the past two years in Parliament, I promise to continue to fight for the equitability and improvement of our local area and saw over my time as your MP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Alex will continue this in Parliament, is Labour's Shadow Fitness Minister, wants to introduce 'Sobel's law' to safeguard our green belts and wildlife.
Alex has a 6-step plan including congestion and city centre surplus charge revenue to be kept by the council.
Alex pledges to fight for increases to the budgets of the councils of Leeds to reduce the gaps in their resources due to Tory austerity.
Alex is involved with co-investment projects to bring empty properties back into use as much-needed affordable and renewable homes.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Jo Swinson voted to treble tuition fees, voted for the bedroom tax, voted against making it illegal to discriminate against members of the armed forces.

issues.economy: Alex has a plan for investment in Leeds, to use council funds generated through congestion charge and city centre surplus to invest in public services.
issues.environment: Alex aims to 'safeguard our green belts and wildlife,' will introduce 'Sobel's law'.
issues.health: Alex will fight for increased budgets due to austerity affecting resources for the councils of Leeds.

housing.content: Alex is working on co-investment projects for empty properties to be utilized as renewable and affordable homes.

leaflet.personalStatement: Alex vows to continue to fight for the equitability and improvement of the local area.

images.caption: Various images of Alex Sobel with constituents, at events, and conducting activities related to his campaign and political engagement.
